text:
Hi there!

I submitted a theme 2 weeks ago, and while I don't expect to have mine approved yet (I can imagine there is a long waiting queue), ever since the end of last year, there is the same number of available themes (68) on the Marketplace.

This makes me wonder what is going on with the themes approval process and if we should still invest resources to create new ones?

Thanks!
<@U019VTD5BDE> reviewing process is not estimated. you can only wait for a confirmation/rejection mail
